footer.tagline: Centralized API catalog management for modern platform teams

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest updates and features.

home.title: Atlas Catalog
home.subtitle: Centralized API catalog management system for tracking and managing your microservices, APIs, and digital assets.

hero.description: Atlas Catalog keeps your service inventory, lifecycles and documentation aligned so platform teams can focus on enablement.

catalog.label: catalogued assets
catalog.description: APIs, lifecycles and domains tracked centrally

featureHighlights.title: Everything observability-ready
featureHighlights.subtitle: Blend discovery, governance and documentation with prebuilt workflows inspired by Metronic layouts.

inventory.label: Inventory
inventory.title: Unified API registry
inventory.description: Map REST, GraphQL, SOAP and event-driven services with consistent metadata.

governance.label: Governance
governance.title: Lifecycle guardrails
governance.description: Track approvals, ownership and lifecycle transitions with policy-driven cues.

insights.label: Insights
insights.title: Operational visibility
insights.description: Surface adoption metrics, quality checks and discovery funnels in one view.

quickLinks.title: Jump into the workspace
quickLinks.subtitle: Navigate directly to the modules your team uses most.

catalog.title: API Catalog
catalog.description: Browse and manage your complete API inventory with rich metadata and documentation.

types.title: API Types
types.description: Categorize your APIs by type: REST, GraphQL, SOAP, and more.

lifecycles.title: Lifecycles
lifecycles.description: Track API lifecycle stages from development to production.

languages.title: Programming Languages
languages.description: Organize APIs by the programming languages they use.

domains.title: Business Domains
domains.description: Group services by business domains for clear ownership.

discovery.title: Discovery Sources
discovery.description: Track how APIs were discovered and registered in the catalog.

howItWorks.title: Ship reliable services faster
howItWorks.subtitle: Atlas Catalog adapts Metronic's flow to the reality of platform engineering teams.

import.title: Connect sources
import.description: Capture APIs from Git repositories, CI pipelines or manual submissions.

enrich.title: Enrich metadata
enrich.description: Classify types, lifecycles, domains and technology context in minutes.

publish.title: Publish & monitor
publish.description: Expose curated docs and track adoption with automated quality scoring.

testimonials.title: Teams feel the difference
testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from platform leaders who standardized on Atlas Catalog.

sofia.quote: Our developers finally have a single source of truth. The new landing mirrors Metronic polish while staying focused on productivity.
sofia.author: Sofia Ramirez

liam.quote: Atlas Catalog gave us governance workflows without slowing teams down. The thematic sections make onboarding effortless.
liam.author: Liam Chen

quickStart.title: Getting started is effortless
quickStart.description: Spin up the Laravel backend, point the frontend to your API URL and invite teams to explore the catalog.
quickStart.features: Full CRUD operations for APIs, Types, Lifecycles, and more

errors.load: We couldn't load the APIs. Please try again.
